column2: "Na wɔdze Josef kɔr Egypt
column3: na Potifar
column4: Farao no somfo a ɔyɛ n'abrafohen no
column5: tɔɔ no wɔ Ismaelfo a wɔdze no kɔr hɔ no hɔn nsamu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dzii Josef n'ekyir na ɔyɛɛ siar wɔ no wura Egyptnyi no ne fie."
column3: "#Ndwu 7.9"

column2: "Na no wura hun dɛ EWURADZE nye no nam
column3: na EWURADZE maa dza ɔyɛɛ no nyinara yɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Na Josef nyaa n'enyim enyimnyam
column3: na ɔsoom no: na ɔyɛɛ no panyin wɔ ne fie
column4: na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ ne nsa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ofitsi aber a ɔyɛɛ no panyin wɔ ne fie
column3: na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ ne nsa no
column4: Josef ntsi EWURADZE hyiraa Egyptnyi no ne fie; na EWURADZE ne nhyira baa dza ɔwɔ nyinara do
column5: dza ɔwɔ fie nye dza ɔwɔ haban mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa; nna noara nnyim dza ɔwɔ no hɔ gyedɛ edziban a ɔnoara dzi. Nna Josef no ho yɛ fɛw
column3: na n'enyim wɔ nyam."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no
column3: no wura ne yer no dze n'enyi sii Josef do; na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔpowee
column3: na ɔsee no wura ne yer no dɛ
column5: mo wura nnyim dza ɔwɔ mo hɔ wɔ fie ha
column6: na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara ahyɛ me nsa;"

column2: "obiara nnyɛ kɛse nnkyɛn me wɔ fie ha; nkyii so ɔnnkam me biribiara ka wo ho
column3: osiandɛ eyɛ ne yer: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na mebɛyɛ emumuyɛ kɛse yi

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: daa daa nyinara ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Josef

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber yi mu no ɔkɔr fie hɔ dɛ ɔrekɛyɛ n'edwuma; nna fie no mu nyimpa no mu biara nnyi hɔ"
"na basia no suoo n'atar mu
column3: dɛ
column4: Enye me nda: na Josef gyaa n'atar no wɔ ne nsamu

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ohun dɛ oegya n'atar no wɔ ne nsamu
column6: "ɔfrɛfrɛɛ no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne fie no
column9: ɔakɛfa Hebriwnyi aba ma oribesi hɛn atwetwe; ɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛ ɔnye me rebɛda
column10: na medze ndze kɛse kekaa mu:"

column2: "na ɔbaa dɛ aber a ɔtsee dɛ memaa me ndze do na mekekaa mu no
column3: nna ɔdaan n'atar gyaa me nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔdze n'atar no guu ne nkyɛn ara ma okodur dɛ no wura baa fie."
"Na ɔkaa no dɛmara kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Akowaa Hebriwnyi a edze no brɛɛ hɛn no
column4: ɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛ orubogu mo ho fi"

column2: "na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: memaa me ndze do
column5: nna ɔdaan n'atar gyaa me nkyɛn

column2: "Na aber a no wura tsee ne yer ne nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ w'akowaa ayɛ me nye yi no; no bo fuuw kɛsenara."

column2: "Na Josef no wura faa no dze no kɔtoo efiadze
column3: beebi mbrɛ ɔhen n'adaduafo gu no: na ɔdaa efiadze hɔ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dzii Josef n'ekyir
column3: na ɔdoom no
column4: na ɔmaa onyaa efiadzehwɛfo no n'enyim enyimnyam."

column2: "Na efiadzehwɛfo no dze adaduafo a wɔwɔ efiadze hɔ no nyinara hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa; na biribiara a wɔyɛɛ no wɔ hɔ no
column3: ɔnoara na ɔhwɛe."

column2: "Efiadzehwɛfo no annhaw no ho wɔ dza ɔdze hyɛɛ ne nsa mu no mu biara ho
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE nye no nam; na biribiara a ɔyɛe no
